mapper.select: select * from WARNING order by regdate desc
select W.reporter, W.regdate, W.reason, R.id, R.content, R.review_num from WARNING W, REVIEW R where W.review_num=R.review_num and W.warning_num=#{warningNum}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set classify=#{classify} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into WARNING (warning_num, review_num, reason, reporter, regdate) values(warning_seq.nextval, #{reviewNum}, #{reason}, #{reporter}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select M.id, M.classify, N.regdate from MEMBER M, NOTICE N where M.id=N.authority and M.classify > 3
mapper.update: update MEMBER set classify=1 where id=#{id}
